Reviews.Title: seller described phone as unlocked new
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: when I received the phone it looked new.  I had an extremely difficult time finding anyone who would activate this phone.  Apple told me it was originally purchased in Nov, 2011.  AT&T; told me I was the 5th person activating the phone.  Paid $610.00 for a much used phone with no warranty other than 1 month from deal grabber.  Phone would only charge to 40%.  That's probably why the other 4 people got rid of it.  Can't put a new battery in because it's some how part of the phone. Sent it back told them if they can't replace with a new phone under apple warranty give me a refund.  This is the third day still waiting.  Amazon rep put a complaint in for me and assured me of my refund.  Went to AT&T; because I am already set up with an account bought iphone for $349.00 not as much GB but really did not need it for my use. So buyer beware new doesn't always mean new.  Not like the price was too good to be true, but did not get what was represented.

Reviews.Title: Arrived Super Fast, Messed Up Camera
Reviews.Author: CBennet
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because I lost my previous 64GB 4s, and you can't buy this phone new anymore. I need the storage, but I didn't want to shell out $850 for a new 64GB iPhone 5 w/o a contract or upgrade. I ordered it Thursday afternoon and it arrived Friday morning, which was great. I was concerned at first because the Apple box said 16GB, but the Amazon label said 64GB. Luckily the Amazon label was correct. After a few days, the phone is working great in all areas but one: there's something wrong with the camera, causing all photos to be fuzzy. Since this isn't an essential function, I'm still happy I saved money over a new iPhone 5.

Reviews.Title: Faulty iPhone Rear Camera, was advertised as Like new
Reviews.Author: Daulat Pal Singh
Reviews.Content: First time dared to buy from amazon warehouse deals. IT was supposed to be like new means no scratches, no hardware flaws nothing. just no warranty was the only thing which was not supposed to be coming with this product. I purchased it for one of my relatives who lives on the west coast was leaving to India for almost six months. Hoped that the product, because I am buying from amazon would be defect free as promised on their website. But !The device was delivered. went to India with my relative who has an active AT&T; connection in the USA. They wanted to take pictures while being in India. And the rear camera was not able to focus. Hardware fault with the rear camera. Vow!I called the amazon helpdesk and told them that the person who has this faulty product will be back to USA almost after six months. She promised that she would extend the return date on the product so that when my relative will be back, I could generate a return slip and send it back to amazon. surprisingly, the new date was never put in for return and now they have to cope up with a faulty phone even after paying around $450 for this device.Lesson learnt. No more relying on what amazon says, I mean like new didn't have to mean that Camera was faulty. Right??

Reviews.Title: Don't buy if the seller doesn't provide details on the condition of the phone
Reviews.Author: Wong Wai Ming
Reviews.Content: The condition of the phone is not match to what the seller write. The seller writes 'like new' but the phone I received have 2 obvious scratches on the screen and many scratches on the sides of the phone. The phone shows normal wears and have dents and only fair cosmetic appearance.

Reviews.Title: iPhone
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: Everything is great with my phone . Fast delivery but the package was in bad shape . Easy for someone to get my phone from the original box .

Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 4s 64GB White - AT&T;
Reviews.Author: Sue Johnson
Reviews.Content: I have owned the iPhone 4s and it was one of the best ones. Never had a problem with the battery. I would sometimes forget to dock it for 2 days and it still had life. I love the white one and I got the 64gb with just a few gigs left to fill. I loved this phone.Apple iPhone 4S 64GB (White) - AT&T;

Reviews.Title: Beautiful!!!!!
Reviews.Author: BacHoBiSida
Reviews.Content: Very fast shipped. Clean ESD, My phone looked like brand new and works great. I have it on a straight talk plan and couldn't be happier with both!Thanks for the sale!

Reviews.Title: I Love Apple
Reviews.Author: Christian McAllister
Reviews.Content: I've finally decided to retire my 3GS. And I couldn't be more pleased with the 4s. This is an incredible device. The 3rd party sale was flawless and the 4s as described (if not better). Apple knows how to marry form, function, and style together to make a beautiful yet simple device.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Has some scuffs and this phone was locked, hard to use. But great  this is a great cell phone. Slick.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: the iphone 4s is the best phone ive ever had without a doubt. i absolutely love it. the only time id trade it is if apple came out with an iphone that had a physical qwerty keyboard lol

Reviews.Title: love the product
Reviews.Author: Sergio Encina
Reviews.Content: I love the product and It's for my daughter Thank you. I will shop & recommend to friends & co workers

Reviews.Title: Iphone 4s 64gb
Reviews.Author: Cindy Dupuis-Swigart
Reviews.Content: I like the purchase I got.  It was a bit used for condition but seems to be functioning well.  I love to use the iphone to the full capacity that it is capable of while also pampering it with a great cover, cleaning out junk and doing my best to make it run smoothly.  I have had an iphone 3gs, 4, 4s 32gb and now wanted a 64 due to the amount of apps that I like to play with that have larger files.So far I can see the camera is working well, the headphone jack is working, the speakers are working. I have noticed a couple of glitches in settings but hoping this is just a function of apple or operating system that I have not grasped.

Reviews.Title: Was a hassle free purchase.
Reviews.Author: Crystal
Reviews.Content: I had reservations about ordering something so expensive used. I got a bonus charger with my order! My phone looked like brand new and works great. I have it on a straight talk plan and couldn't be happier with both!Thanks for the sale!

Reviews.Title: Great phone and really comfortable for use
Reviews.Author: Dulish Tharanga Perera
Reviews.Content: This is the best phone I ever had, I love this phone and it is so easy to use all functions also it is not anything complicated and it is well working and I recommends for anyone to buy this phone.

Reviews.Title: رائعون
Reviews.Author: saad
Reviews.Content: لقد سهلتم بحث احد الاصدقاء في دراستة العاليا انتم صادقون في تعاملكم معنا لكم مني احلى القبولات والتحاية وشكرا لكم

Reviews.Title: Good product  looks like new
Reviews.Author: juan garcia
Reviews.Content: Really nice phone but I asked for unlock one and the one I got was locked to AT&T; I really like it

Reviews.Title: Not very good battery!
Reviews.Author: Norseman
Reviews.Content: I had an iPhone 4 previous to the 4S, and the battery life on the 4S is really poor. I use the Mophie battery pack to add some juice, but that shouldn't be needed!It's faster than the 4 and with a much better camera.

Reviews.Title: Unlocked?
Reviews.Author: Amaury
Reviews.Content: When I inserted my sim card the phone showed a message telling me theres an invalid sim and the carrier its not supported.I am outside US and dont know waht to do now.

Reviews.Title: NeverAgain!!
Reviews.Author: NeverAgain
Reviews.Content: Why sell a "factory unlocked" iphone 4s with an AT&T; card which I can not even activate if I am not living in the States, which I am not?! And now I have to courier the phone for a refund on my cost. This is unacceptable! Why can't they just open the carrier lock at a fee, it is much easier anyways.

Reviews.Title: BEST PHONE IN THE WORLD
Reviews.Author: jason zakarya
Reviews.Content: AMAZING EVERY THING ON THIS PHONE WILL MAKE YOU HARD OR WET  I LOVE IT!! THIS PRODUCT IS SPEECHLESS IT IS ONE OF THE BEST PHONES IN THE MARKET .
